testcase.name: User makes a successful payment with a valid credit card
testcase.system-out: Given the user is logged into their account.................................passed When the user navigates to the "Make Payment" page..........................passed And the user enters a valid credit card number..............................passed And the user enters the expiration date.....................................passed And the user enters the CVV code............................................passed And the user enters a valid payment amount..................................passed And the user clicks "Pay"...................................................passed Then the user should see a confirmation message stating the payment was successful.passed And the user's account balance should reflect the payment...................passed
